    • Method Detail

      • init

        @PostConstruct
public boolean init()
             throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                    java.lang.InstantiationException,
                    BackendException
        Causes the backend system to initialize by dynamically creating the configured provider as specified in the property scim.provider.bean. Once created, the init(config) method of the provider is called to initialize the provider.
        Returns:
        true if provider is ready.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the provider class (specified in scim.provider.bean property) could not be loaded.
        java.lang.InstantiationException - Thrown when the provider specified failed to be created using newInstance() method.
        BackendException - An error thrown by the provider related to SCIM (e.g. parsing schema).

public void shutdown()
